Title: Conning the Artists
Plot:
Eddie's bar is the "Hustle" crew's hangout and the place to go when celebrating the success of a recent con. Unfortunately, their most recent celebration comes to a grinding halt when they are taken hostage. A man claiming that the gang dishonored his family has come to seek revenge and this time it's not about money - it's personal.
Can the grifters negotiate their way out, or have they gone too far and must pay the ultimate sacrifice?
GuestStars: Karen Asemper, Martin Maynard, Tristram Wymark, Eiji Kusuhara, Charlotte Nguyen, Paul Venables, Will Yun Lee
